text: This is a list of international schools in Guangzhou, China:Listing of Guangzhou schools * American International School of Guangzhou * Canadian International School of Guangzhou * Guangzhou Nanfang International School * Clifford International School * The British School of Guangzhou * Utahloy International School of Guangzhou * Huamei-Bond International College *Ulink College Guangzhou ==References== Category:Education in Guangzhou Category:International schools in China Category:Private schools in China
title: International schools in Guangzhou
